attributes.action: Ban the already illegal act of multiple marriages and the claiming of any benefits for more than one family.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Husbands who bring more than one wife to Britain, can claim extra benefits for them at taxpayers expense.  Muslims will be able to bring up to four wives and their children into the country and claim benefits for all of them. This is still a christian country and to commit bigamy is an illegal act. If the Government finances this act then this too must be looked upon as illegal .
This is a burden which should not be left for the British taxpayer to pay for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
